member.name: P:ExifTool.ExecuteResult.StdOutLines
member.summary: The lines captured from exiftool stdout stream

member.name: P:ExifTool.ExecuteResult.StdErrLines
member.summary: The lines captured from exiftool stderr stream

member.name: T:ExifTool.Wrapper
member.summary: A wrapper for exiftool.exe to encapsulate the 'stay_open' behavior See: https://exiftool.org/ https://exiftool.org/exiftool_pod.html#Advanced-options
member.remarks: Takes care of the details of IPC via stdin and stdout without blocking or causing the child process stream buffers to fill.

member.name: M:ExifTool.Wrapper.Execute(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Pass the supplied parameter list to exiftool, execute and return the results
member.returns: The output from exiftool stdout stream
